referenceObject.reference: Zhukovets, E. M. (2021). [Additions and remarks to the list of spiders of the Teberda State Natural Biosphere Reserve with description of a new species of the genus Araneus Clerck, 1757 (Aranei, Araneidae)]. In: Prischepchik, O. V. & Makovetskaya, E. V. (eds.) Results and prospects for the development of entomology in Eastern Europe: a collection of articles of the IV International Scientific and Practical Conference dedicated to the memory of Alexander Mikhailovich Tereshkin (1953–2020), December 1–3, 2021, Minsk. A. N. Varaksin, Minsk, pp. 26-38.
